titleStmt.title: A short appendix to the life of Edmund Stanton, D.D. wherein some passages are further cleared, which were not so fully held forth by the former authors.
titleStmt.author: Fulman, William, 1632-1688.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Fulman by Wing.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
